summary: This simple mod will make the book fetching quests from Urag gro-Shub feature skill books instead of rare books to give the player an opportunity to further their talents in an immersive, RPG-friendly way.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]Radiant Skill Books[/size][/b]

Version:1.0

[b][u]Contact Info:[/u][/b]
lindazorra89@gmail.com

[b][u]Author:[/u][/b]
iPalantir

[b][u]Description:[/u][/b]
This simple mod will make the radiant book fetching quests from Urag gro-Shub feature skill books instead of rare books to give the player an opportunity to further their talents in an immersive, RPG-friendly way. The mod alters the content of one leveled list, so it should be pretty much compatible with everything else.

If you run into any trouble, please feel free to contact me!

[b][u]Installation:[/u][/b]
Download with NMM or equivalent, enable, profit.
Download manually, put in Skyrim/Data folder, enable in Skyrim Launcher/Mod Manager, profit.

[b][u]Uninstallation:[/u][/b]
Disable in Mod Manager or Skyrim Launcher.

[b][u]Change Log:[/u][/b]
1.0 - Initial release.

[b][u]Future Updates:[/u][/b]
I plan to expand the mod with lore friendly ways of obtaining more, previously unlocatable stuff.
author: iPalantir
